title: [Little women : publicity kit]
brief_description: Publicity kit for the production Little Women (1994), including 8 B&W Stills (Large), 5 35mm Colour Transparencies, 1 Press Kit/ Review. Director Gillian Armstrong, Starring Winona Ryder, Trini Alvarado, Kirsten Dunst, Claire Danes, Samantha Mathis, Susan Sarandon, Christian Bale, Gabriel Byrne.
